ApiDefinitionInfo.description: Information about the formal API definition for the app.

url.description: The URL of the API definition.

AppServiceEnvironment.description: Description of an App Service Environment.

name.description: Name of the App Service Environment.

location.description: Location of the App Service Environment, e.g. "West US".

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the App Service Environment.

status.description: Current status of the App Service Environment.

vnetName.description: Name of the Virtual Network for the App Service Environment.

vnetResourceGroupName.description: Resource group of the Virtual Network.

internalLoadBalancingMode.description: Specifies which endpoints to serve internally in the Virtual Network for the App Service Environment.

workerPools.description: Description of worker pools with worker size IDs, VM sizes, and number of workers in each pool.

ipsslAddressCount.description: Number of IP SSL addresses reserved for the App Service Environment.

databaseEdition.description: Edition of the metadata database for the App Service Environment, e.g. "Standard".

databaseServiceObjective.description: Service objective of the metadata database for the App Service Environment, e.g. "S0".

upgradeDomains.description: Number of upgrade domains of the App Service Environment.

subscriptionId.description: Subscription of the App Service Environment.

dnsSuffix.description: DNS suffix of the App Service Environment.

lastAction.description: Last deployment action on the App Service Environment.

lastActionResult.description: Result of the last deployment action on the App Service Environment.

allowedMultiSizes.description: List of comma separated strings describing which VM sizes are allowed for front-ends.

allowedWorkerSizes.description: List of comma separated strings describing which VM sizes are allowed for workers.

maximumNumberOfMachines.description: Maximum number of VMs in the App Service Environment.

vipMappings.description: Description of IP SSL mapping for the App Service Environment.

environmentCapacities.description: Current total, used, and available worker capacities.

networkAccessControlList.description: Access control list for controlling traffic to the App Service Environment.

environmentIsHealthy.description: True/false indicating whether the App Service Environment is healthy.

environmentStatus.description: Detailed message about with results of the last check of the App Service Environment.

resourceGroup.description: Resource group of the App Service Environment.

apiManagementAccountId.description: API Management Account associated with the App Service Environment.

suspended.description: true if the App Service Environment is suspended; otherwise, false. The environment can be suspended, e.g. when the management endpoint is no longer available (most likely because NSG blocked the incoming traffic).

dynamicCacheEnabled.description:
True/false indicating whether the App Service Environment is suspended. The environment can be suspended e.g. when the management endpoint is no longer available
(most likely because NSG blocked the incoming traffic).

clusterSettings.description: Custom settings for changing the behavior of the App Service Environment.

userWhitelistedIpRanges.description: User added ip ranges to whitelist on ASE db

hasLinuxWorkers.description: Flag that displays whether an ASE has linux workers or not

sslCertKeyVaultId.description: Key Vault ID for ILB App Service Environment default SSL certificate

sslCertKeyVaultSecretName.description: Key Vault Secret Name for ILB App Service Environment default SSL certificate

workerTierName.description: Target worker tier assigned to the App Service plan.

hostingEnvironmentProfile.description: Specification for the App Service Environment to use for the App Service plan.

maximumNumberOfWorkers.description: Maximum number of instances that can be assigned to this App Service plan.

geoRegion.description: Geographical location for the App Service plan.

perSiteScaling.description: If true, apps assigned to this App Service plan can be scaled independently. If false, apps assigned to this App Service plan will scale to all instances of the plan.

maximumElasticWorkerCount.description: Maximum number of total workers allowed for this ElasticScaleEnabled App Service Plan

numberOfSites.description: Number of apps assigned to this App Service plan.

isSpot.description: If true, this App Service Plan owns spot instances.

spotExpirationTime.description: The time when the server farm expires. Valid only if it is a spot server farm.

freeOfferExpirationTime.description: The time when the server farm free offer expires.

resourceGroup.description: Resource group of the App Service plan.

reserved.description: If Linux app service plan true, false otherwise.

isXenon.description: Obsolete: If Hyper-V container app service plan true, false otherwise.

hyperV.description: If Hyper-V container app service plan true, false otherwise.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the App Service Environment.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

AutoHealActions.description: Actions which to take by the auto-heal module when a rule is triggered.

minProcessExecutionTime.description:
Minimum time the process must execute
before taking the action

AutoHealCustomAction.description:
Custom action to be executed
when an auto heal rule is triggered.

AutoHealRules.description: Rules that can be defined for auto-heal.

triggers.description: Conditions that describe when to execute the auto-heal actions.

actions.description: Actions to be executed when a rule is triggered.

requests.description: A rule based on total requests.

privateBytesInKB.description: A rule based on private bytes.

statusCodes.description: A rule based on status codes.

slowRequests.description: A rule based on request execution time.

AzureStorageInfoValue.description: Azure Files or Blob Storage access information value for dictionary storage.

shareName.description: Name of the file share (container name, for Blob storage).

accessKey.description: Access key for the storage account.

mountPath.description: Path to mount the storage within the site's runtime environment.

Capability.description: Describes the capabilities/features allowed for a specific SKU.

correlationId.description:
Correlation ID of cloning operation. This ID ties multiple cloning operations
together to use the same snapshot.

cloneCustomHostNames.description: true to clone custom hostnames from source app; otherwise, false.

cloneSourceControl.description: true to clone source control from source app; otherwise, false.

sourceWebAppId.description:
ARM resource ID of the source app. App resource ID is of the form 
/subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{siteName} for production slots and 
/subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{siteName}/slots/{slotName} for other slots.

sourceWebAppLocation.description: Location of source app ex: West US or North Europe

appSettingsOverrides.description:
Application setting overrides for cloned app. If specified, these settings override the settings cloned 
from source app. Otherwise, application settings from source app are retained.

configureLoadBalancing.description: true to configure load balancing for source and destination app.

trafficManagerProfileId.description:
ARM resource ID of the Traffic Manager profile to use, if it exists. Traffic Manager resource ID is of the form 
/subscriptions/{subId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/trafficManagerProfiles/{profileName}.

trafficManagerProfileName.description: Name of Traffic Manager profile to create. This is only needed if Traffic Manager profile does not already exist.

CorsSettings.description: Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) settings for the app.

allowedOrigins.description:
Gets or sets the list of origins that should be allowed to make cross-origin
calls (for example: http://example.com:12345). Use "*" to allow all.

supportCredentials.description:
Gets or sets whether CORS requests with credentials are allowed. See 
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/CORS#Requests_with_credentials
for more details.

CsmOperationCollection.description: Collection of Azure resource manager operation metadata.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

CsmOperationDescription.description: Description of an operation available for Microsoft.Web resource provider.

CsmOperationDescriptionProperties.description: Properties available for a Microsoft.Web resource provider operation.

CsmOperationDisplay.description: Meta data about operation used for display in portal.

unit.description: Units of measurement for the quota resource.

nextResetTime.description: Next reset time for the resource counter.

currentValue.description: The current value of the resource counter.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

code.description: Standardized string to programmatically identify the error.

message.description: Detailed error description and debugging information.

target.description: Detailed error description and debugging information.

code.description: Standardized string to programmatically identify the error.

message.description: Detailed error description and debugging information.

target.description: Detailed error description and debugging information.

deletedSiteId.description: Numeric id for the deleted site

deletedTimestamp.description: Time in UTC when the app was deleted.

resourceGroup.description: ResourceGroup that contained the deleted site

kind.description: Kind of site that was deleted

geoRegionName.description: Geo Region of the deleted site

Dimension.description:
Dimension of a resource metric. For e.g. instance specific HTTP requests for a web app, 
where instance name is dimension of the metric HTTP request

ErrorEntity.description: Body of the error response returned from the API.

HandlerMapping.description:
The IIS handler mappings used to define which handler processes HTTP requests with certain extension. 
For example, it is used to configure php-cgi.exe process to handle all HTTP requests with *.php extension.

extension.description: Requests with this extension will be handled using the specified FastCGI application.

scriptProcessor.description: The absolute path to the FastCGI application.

arguments.description: Command-line arguments to be passed to the script processor.

virtualIP.description: Virtual IP address assigned to the hostname if IP based SSL is enabled.

toUpdate.description: Set to true to update existing hostname.

hostType.description: Indicates whether the hostname is a standard or repository hostname.

HostingEnvironmentProfile.description: Specification for an App Service Environment to use for this resource.

id.description: Resource ID of the App Service Environment.

name.description: Name of the App Service Environment.

type.description: Resource type of the App Service Environment.

HybridConnection.description: Hybrid Connection contract. This is used to configure a Hybrid Connection.

serviceBusNamespace.description: The name of the Service Bus namespace.

relayName.description: The name of the Service Bus relay.

relayArmUri.description: The ARM URI to the Service Bus relay.

sendKeyName.description: The name of the Service Bus key which has Send permissions. This is used to authenticate to Service Bus.

sendKeyValue.description:
The value of the Service Bus key. This is used to authenticate to Service Bus. In ARM this key will not be returned
normally, use the POST /listKeys API instead.

serviceBusSuffix.description: The suffix for the service bus endpoint. By default this is .servicebus.windows.net

HybridConnectionKey.description: Hybrid Connection key contract. This has the send key name and value for a Hybrid Connection.

sendKeyName.description: The name of the send key.

sendKeyValue.description: The value of the send key.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

IpSecurityRestriction.description: IP security restriction on an app.

ipAddress.description:
IP address the security restriction is valid for.
It can be in form of pure ipv4 address (required SubnetMask property) or
CIDR notation such as ipv4/mask (leading bit match). For CIDR,
SubnetMask property must not be specified.

subnetMask.description: Subnet mask for the range of IP addresses the restriction is valid for.

action.description: Allow or Deny access for this IP range.

tag.description: Defines what this IP filter will be used for. This is to support IP filtering on proxies.

LocalizableString.description: Localizable string object containing the name and a localized value.

LogSpecification.description: Log Definition of a single resource metric.

principalId.description: Principal Id of managed service identity.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}

principalId.description: Principal Id of user assigned identity

clientId.description: Client Id of user assigned identity

MetricAvailability.description: Retention policy of a resource metric.

MetricSpecification.description: Definition of a single resource metric.

description.description: Description of network access control entry.

status.description: The current status of the operation.

errors.description: Any errors associate with the operation.

modifiedTime.description: Time when operation has been updated.

geoMasterOperationId.description: Applicable only for stamp operation ids.

ProxyOnlyResource.description: Azure proxy only resource. This resource is not tracked by Azure Resource Manager.

isPushEnabled.description: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether the Push endpoint is enabled.

tagWhitelistJson.description: Gets or sets a JSON string containing a list of tags that are whitelisted for use by the push registration endpoint.

tagsRequiringAuth.description:
Gets or sets a JSON string containing a list of tags that require user authentication to be used in the push registration endpoint.
Tags can consist of alphanumeric characters and the following:
'_', '@', '#', '.', ':', '-'. 
Validation should be performed at the PushRequestHandler.

dynamicTagsJson.description: Gets or sets a JSON string containing a list of dynamic tags that will be evaluated from user claims in the push registration endpoint.

RampUpRule.description: Routing rules for ramp up testing. This rule allows to redirect static traffic % to a slot or to gradually change routing % based on performance.

actionHostName.description: Hostname of a slot to which the traffic will be redirected if decided to. E.g. myapp-stage.azurewebsites.net.

reroutePercentage.description: Percentage of the traffic which will be redirected to ActionHostName.

changeStep.description: In auto ramp up scenario this is the step to add/remove from ReroutePercentage until it reaches MinReroutePercentage or MaxReroutePercentage. Site metrics are checked every N minutes specified in ChangeIntervalInMinutes. Custom decision algorithm can be provided in TiPCallback site extension which URL can be specified in ChangeDecisionCallbackUrl.

changeIntervalInMinutes.description: Specifies interval in minutes to reevaluate ReroutePercentage.

minReroutePercentage.description: Specifies lower boundary above which ReroutePercentage will stay.

maxReroutePercentage.description: Specifies upper boundary below which ReroutePercentage will stay.

changeDecisionCallbackUrl.description:
Custom decision algorithm can be provided in TiPCallback site extension which URL can be specified. See TiPCallback site extension for the scaffold and contracts.
https://www.siteextensions.net/packages/TiPCallback/

name.description: Name of the routing rule. The recommended name would be to point to the slot which will receive the traffic in the experiment.

Resource.description: Azure resource. This resource is tracked in Azure Resource Manager

ResourceMetric.description: Object representing a metric for any resource .

timeGrain.description: Metric granularity. E.g PT1H, PT5M, P1D

retention.description: Retention period for the current time grain.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

metricAvailabilities.description: List of time grains supported for the metric together with retention period.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

ResourceMetricName.description: Name of a metric for any resource .

ServiceSpecification.description: Resource metrics service provided by Microsoft.Insights resource provider.

Site.description: A web app, a mobile app backend, or an API app.

usageState.description: State indicating whether the app has exceeded its quota usage. Read-only.

enabled.description: true if the app is enabled; otherwise, false. Setting this value to false disables the app (takes the app offline).

enabledHostNames.description:
Enabled hostnames for the app.Hostnames need to be assigned (see HostNames) AND enabled. Otherwise,
the app is not served on those hostnames.

availabilityState.description: Management information availability state for the app.

hostNameSslStates.description: Hostname SSL states are used to manage the SSL bindings for app's hostnames.

serverFarmId.description: Resource ID of the associated App Service plan, formatted as: "/subscriptions/{subscriptionID}/resourceGroups/{groupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/serverfarms/{appServicePlanName}".

lastModifiedTimeUtc.description: Last time the app was modified, in UTC. Read-only.

trafficManagerHostNames.description: Azure Traffic Manager hostnames associated with the app. Read-only.

scmSiteAlsoStopped.description: true to stop SCM (KUDU) site when the app is stopped; otherwise, false. The default is false.

targetSwapSlot.description: Specifies which deployment slot this app will swap into. Read-only.

hostingEnvironmentProfile.description: App Service Environment to use for the app.

clientAffinityEnabled.description: true to enable client affinity; false to stop sending session affinity cookies, which route client requests in the same session to the same instance. Default is true.

clientCertEnabled.description: true to enable client certificate authentication (TLS mutual authentication); otherwise, false. Default is false.

clientCertExclusionPaths.description: client certificate authentication comma-separated exclusion paths

hostNamesDisabled.description: true to disable the public hostnames of the app; otherwise, false. If true, the app is only accessible via API management process.

outboundIpAddresses.description: List of IP addresses that the app uses for outbound connections (e.g. database access). Includes VIPs from tenants that site can be hosted with current settings. Read-only.

possibleOutboundIpAddresses.description: List of IP addresses that the app uses for outbound connections (e.g. database access). Includes VIPs from all tenants. Read-only.

dailyMemoryTimeQuota.description: Maximum allowed daily memory-time quota (applicable on dynamic apps only).

suspendedTill.description: App suspended till in case memory-time quota is exceeded.

maxNumberOfWorkers.description:
Maximum number of workers.
This only applies to Functions container.

cloningInfo.description: If specified during app creation, the app is cloned from a source app.

resourceGroup.description: Name of the resource group the app belongs to. Read-only.

isDefaultContainer.description: true if the app is a default container; otherwise, false.

defaultHostName.description: Default hostname of the app. Read-only.

slotSwapStatus.description: Status of the last deployment slot swap operation.

httpsOnly.description:
HttpsOnly: configures a web site to accept only https requests. Issues redirect for
http requests

inProgressOperationId.description: Specifies an operation id if this site has a pending operation.

SiteConfig.description: Configuration of an App Service app.

requestTracingEnabled.description: true if request tracing is enabled; otherwise, false.

remoteDebuggingEnabled.description: true if remote debugging is enabled; otherwise, false.

httpLoggingEnabled.description: true if HTTP logging is enabled; otherwise, false.

detailedErrorLoggingEnabled.description: true if detailed error logging is enabled; otherwise, false.

alwaysOn.description: true if Always On is enabled; otherwise, false.

experiments.description: This is work around for polymorphic types.

autoHealEnabled.description: true if Auto Heal is enabled; otherwise, false.

apiDefinition.description: Information about the formal API definition for the app.

scmIpSecurityRestrictionsUseMain.description: IP security restrictions for scm to use main.

http20Enabled.description: Http20Enabled: configures a web site to allow clients to connect over http2.0

minTlsVersion.description: MinTlsVersion: configures the minimum version of TLS required for SSL requests

reservedInstanceCount.description:
Number of reserved instances.
This setting only applies to the Consumption Plan

SiteLimits.description: Metric limits set on an app.

maxMemoryInMb.description: Maximum allowed memory usage in MB.

maxDiskSizeInMb.description: Maximum allowed disk size usage in MB.

SkuCapacity.description: Description of the App Service plan scale options.

minimum.description: Minimum number of workers for this App Service plan SKU.

maximum.description: Maximum number of workers for this App Service plan SKU.

default.description: Default number of workers for this App Service plan SKU.

scaleType.description: Available scale configurations for an App Service plan.

SkuDescription.description: Description of a SKU for a scalable resource.

tier.description: Service tier of the resource SKU.

size.description: Size specifier of the resource SKU.

family.description: Family code of the resource SKU.

capacity.description: Current number of instances assigned to the resource.

skuCapacity.description: Min, max, and default scale values of the SKU.

capabilities.description: Capabilities of the SKU, e.g., is traffic manager enabled?

SlotSwapStatus.description: The status of the last successful slot swap operation.

timestampUtc.description: The time the last successful slot swap completed.

sourceSlotName.description: The source slot of the last swap operation.

destinationSlotName.description: The destination slot of the last swap operation.

SlowRequestsBasedTrigger.description: Trigger based on request execution time.

time.description: The time the snapshot was taken.

availableCapacity.description: Available capacity (# of machines, bytes of storage etc...).

totalCapacity.description: Total capacity (# of machines, bytes of storage etc...).

workerSizeId.description:
Size ID of machines: 
0 - Small
1 - Medium
2 - Large

excludeFromCapacityAllocation.description: If true, it includes basic apps. Basic apps are not used for capacity allocation.

isApplicableForAllComputeModes.description: true if capacity is applicable for all apps; otherwise, false.

isLinux.description: Is this a linux stamp capacity

User.description: User credentials used for publishing activity.

publishingPasswordHashSalt.description: Password hash salt used for publishing.

inUse.description: Is virtual IP mapping in use.

VirtualNetworkProfile.description: Specification for using a Virtual Network.

id.description: Resource id of the Virtual Network.

type.description: Resource type of the Virtual Network (read-only).

VnetGateway.description: The Virtual Network gateway contract. This is used to give the Virtual Network gateway access to the VPN package.

vpnPackageUri.description: The URI where the VPN package can be downloaded.

certBlob.description:
A certificate file (.cer) blob containing the public key of the private key used to authenticate a 
Point-To-Site VPN connection.

routes.description: The routes that this Virtual Network connection uses.

resyncRequired.description: true if a resync is required; otherwise, false.

dnsServers.description: DNS servers to be used by this Virtual Network. This should be a comma-separated list of IP addresses.

isSwift.description: Flag that is used to denote if this is VNET injection

VnetRoute.description: Virtual Network route contract used to pass routing information for a Virtual Network.

startAddress.description: The starting address for this route. This may also include a CIDR notation, in which case the end address must not be specified.

endAddress.description: The ending address for this route. If the start address is specified in CIDR notation, this must be omitted.

routeType.description:
The type of route this is:
DEFAULT - By default, every app has routes to the local address ranges specified by RFC1918
INHERITED - Routes inherited from the real Virtual Network routes
STATIC - Static route set on the app only

These values will be used for syncing an app's routes with those from a Virtual Network.

nextLink.description: Link to next page of resources.

WorkerPool.description: Worker pool of an App Service Environment.

workerSizeId.description: Worker size ID for referencing this worker pool.

workerSize.description: VM size of the worker pool instances.

workerCount.description: Number of instances in the worker pool.

instanceNames.description: Names of all instances in the worker pool (read only).
